name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Walmart Only No Third Party Seller

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the extension to filter product lists on Walmart by excluding third-party sellers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of sifting through third-party sellers when searching for products on Walmart.com? The Walmart Only No Third Party Sellers extension enhances your shopping experience by excluding third-party sellers from search results. With just one click, you can ensure that you only see items sold directly by Walmart.

This extension is perfect for loyal Walmart customers who want a streamlined and reliable shopping experience. Available wherever Walmart.com operates.

Get Started:

1. Install the extension.
2. Perform a search (e.g., "bluetooth speaker") using the search box on Walmart.com.
3. On the search results page, click the extension icon. If the filter is successful, the icon will change to display a green dot.
4. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused shopping experience with products sold directly by Walmart.

Happy shopping!

We do NOT collect any user information. We might use affiliate links from our partners.
